## Load libraries

```{r libraries}
library("tidyverse")
library("here")
```

## Import compiled dataset from local files.

### Spore data

Import spore trap data and inspect.

```{r spore-data}
spore_data <- read_csv(here("data/spore_data.csv")) %>%
  mutate(field = as.factor(field))
ftable(xtabs(~ field + time_min + trap_coord, spore_data))

glimpse(spore_data)
```

### Weather data

Import weather data and inspect.

```{r meteo-data}
meteo_data <- read_csv(here("data/wind.csv")) %>%
  mutate(field = as.factor(field))

glimpse(meteo_data)
```

## Save data sets as Rdata files

```{r}
save(spore_data, meteo_data, file = "data/dat.Rdata")
```
